EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2018-05-24-RD-Sponsored-Denver.Marketing Invite 1.EMAIL 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Last Chance - You're Invited Denver IT Networking Event 5/24 - Top Golf Centennial
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We're getting ready to host an exclusive event in the Denver area for a presentation on workload automation at Top Golf Centennial followed by an evening of food, drink, golf and networking. Data center and cloud advancements are happening at an unprecedented rate. That means more decisions, requiring a broader set of skills to keep your workloads happy. Denver IT Networking Event - Top Golf
Where: Top Golf Centennial Thursday, May 24th 5-8pm Register Here <[[https://www.eventbrite.com/e/turbonomic-it-networking-event-denver-top-golf-tickets-45434714454]]>
Join your peers for the next stop in our IT Networking Series to share knowledge on tackling these challenges and learn how organizations like yours are adopting workload automation at the scale of hybrid cloud.
Register here <[[https://www.eventbrite.com/e/turbonomic-it-networking-event-denver-top-golf-tickets-45434714454]]>
We hope you'll be able join us,
The Turbonomic Team
